newsitem.title: USA: Wheels Sports files for IPO of 900,000 common shrs.
newsitem.headline: Wheels Sports files for IPO of 900,000 common shrs.

text.p: Wheels Sports Group Inc said Tuesday it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for the initial public offering of 900,000 common shares and 900,000 share warrants.
It said it expects the offering to be priced at between $6 and $6.50 a share and net proceeds to be about $4.4 million.
The warrants would be exercisable over the next five years, subject to the company's right to redeem them under certain circumstances, it said.
It said two warrants would entitle holders to buy one share of common stock for $7.80 a share.
The offering will be made through Schneider Securities Inc. Wheels said it granted the firm an over-allotment option for up to 135,000 additional shares.
Wheels Sports designs and distributes trading cards featuring race drivers, team owners and crew chiefs active in the National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing (NASCAR).
